title: Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site: D.R.E.A.M. Gallery
body: D.R.E.A.M. Gallery Exhibitions         President Jimmy Carter and Mrs. Coretta Scott King Carter Presidential Library and Museum  "Georgia's Global Peacemakers: The Carter and King Legacy" This featured exhibition is produced by the National Park Service in partnership with Carter Presidential Library and Museum, and The King Center. The exhibition highlights Georgiaâ€™s two great leaders of change, President Jimmy Carter and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. The images illustrated throughout the exhibition depict the close bond between the Carter and King families through the years and tells the story of the creation of the Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historic Site.
